forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers. Partly sunny. High near 75, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. West wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers before 9pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West wind 6 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Isolated rain showers between 11am and 2pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms then Mostly Clear
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West northwest wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
